game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as 'The Devourer'. Players take on the role of an ancient being tasked with guiding humanity's greatest memories through time, while unraveling the mystery behind The Devourer's existence.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Remembrance, where players are awakened to their true purpose. With the help of a cryptic guide named Aria, they must learn to harness their abilities and navigate the ever-changing landscape of memories.
game.ending: As The Devourer draws near, players must confront their own mortality and make a choice that will determine the fate of humanity: preserve the past or forge a new future. Will the echoes of eternity remain forever, or will they fade into the void?
